content.en: Wave prediction: Scientists have been exploring the use of artificial intelligence (AI) algorithms to predict various aspects of ocean waves, such as wave height, wave trains, wind speed, and sea surface height anomaly. These algorithms, such as deep learning neural networks and LSTM models, are being used to improve the accuracy of wave forecasts and enhance our understanding of ocean dynamics. By harnessing the power of AI, researchers hope to provide more reliable predictions for activities like offshore operations and coastal management.
content.da: Bølgeforudsigelse: Forskere har undersøgt brugen af kunstig intelligens (AI) algoritmer til at forudsige forskellige aspekter af havbølger, såsom bølgehøjde, bølgetog, vindhastighed og anomali i havoverfladehøjde. Disse algoritmer, såsom deep learning neurale netværk og LSTM-modeller, anvendes til at forbedre nøjagtigheden af bølgeprognoser og øge vores forståelse af havets dynamik. Ved at udnytte AI's kraft håber forskere at kunne give mere pålidelige forudsigelser for aktiviteter som offshore operationer og kystforvaltning.
